pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.5: _Asambhinnena vilepanena_ is an unusual expression. According to Sp-t 3.1.357, _asambhinnena_ means “with (make-up) not smeared, not lost”, _amakkhitena, anaṭṭhena_.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.8: For an explanation of the renderings “bath powder” and “soap” for _cuṇṇa_ and _mattika_ respectively, see Appendix of Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.21: For a discussion of the _yojana_, see Appendix of Technical Terms.
